task.title: Break Down a marketing report
task.shortdesc: Steps that describe how to run a breakdown report.

step.cmd: Run a report that supports correlations or subrelations, such as Site Content > Pages.
In the report table, click the Breakdown By icon.

info.p: If the Breakdown By icon is not visible, the feature is either not available or not enabled.

stepresult.p: The Breakdown By menu displays all available correlation and conversion breakdown options available for the current report.
